message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. While I cannot disclose the specifics of the product, I can assure you it holds significant worth.  I'm confident that you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your portfolio.  I'm offering this product to you exclusively for $1400000. This is a fair price, considering the product's true value. Please consider this offer carefully.  I'm sure you won't regret it.
